::Stratus/Neody/Crater::

Stratus blinks, consciousness slowly filling his mind. He groans and 
stands up, looking around the group. He knew who he was and he knew 
who they were, and he also knew why he was here. Stratus takes a few 
shaky steps, looking at Biomass.

He was about two feet shorter than Biomass, grey-white colored due to 
his beast mode being a great white shark. There was a fin on his 
back, and one of his arms was his shark head, its eyes looking around 
the room.

"Well, are we going to get going or are we just gonna stand here?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Neody also gains cinsciousness, sitting up in time to catch the end 
of Stratus' comment. If he didn't feel so new to all this, he'd tell 
Stratus to shut up, but he was feeling slightly dizzy at the moment. 
Neody rubbs a hand on his forehead, trying to clear it. He frowns, 
looking down at his hands and seeing that they were crab legs. There 
was a missile launcher in the middle of each hand. He'd be good for 
battle, but not really for handling small objects.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
A groan is heard from the last bot as he stands up and shakes his 
head to clear it. He was Crater, the group's weapons expert. Two 
scabberds hung down from his waist, each containing a light blue 
sword. He was mostly blue, and was about a foot smaller than Biomass. 
He had a large rifle in his back compartment, and several pistols in 
thigh and arm compartments. His optics could fire laser blasts, and 
his beast mode tail was attached to his left shoulder, a missile 
launcher on his right. His beast mode was a sting ray.

Crater looks to Biomass for orders.








--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> 
> * His name was Biomass, and from what he remembered he was part of 
a crew of 
> 6.
> He sat on the floor with the rest of his crew, blinking a few times 
before 
> looking around him and scanning the ship and his troops for the 
first time.
> He knew their mission, from the Great Ones:
> 1) Seek out the transformer races.
> 2) Play dumb, reporting that their ship just crashed, and mingle in 
with 
> them.
> 3) Study and document them, reporting back to this ship ever month 
or so.
> That was what his prime directive was.
> Him and the rest of the crew, that is. It was kinda weird, knowing 
that you 
> were put on this planet from a heigher power only to study a race 
that they 
> seeked to destroy. But he would and so would the rest of the crew.
> By now they each had their own beast mode as well, looking his over 
and 
> smiling.
> This adventure was going to be fairly exciting, and that was good 
thinking 
> for a person who was a hunk of stone less then 20 cycles ago.
> But enough about this, a feeling worming up on him that it was 
about time 
> that they got their skid-plates in gear.
> Biomass coughed slightly to clear his lungs as he got to his feet, 
a little 
> unsteadily since it was the first time EVER that he stood.
> As a 10 foot transformer, Biomass wasn't something to be taken 
lightly.
> And niether was his beast mode, which made up for his size.
> 
> On the floor a slender form stired, sighing as she rose to a sit.
> From what she knew her name was Sublime, and she was the explorer 
for the 
> group. Like a scout, not to pit too fine a point on it.
> Her aqua green eyes searched the room until they fell on Biomass, 
wondering 
> just what his beast mode was with those tenticles haning from his 
shoulders, 
> making up some kind of gray cape.
> Her own beast mode was similar but more basic, but she did live the 
> clear/blue jelly-like armor that fell from her hips like a skirt, 
finding 
> that the same things fell from her head like blue/clear hair...only 
one 
> piece.
> 
> 
> On the other side of the room there was a sneeze, making both 
Biomass and 
> Sublime look over.
> A skinny, also slender but not as much, woman sat up, sniffing 
slightly.
> This one was called Nue'e.
> Her beast mode wasn't exactly easy to see, it was even harder to 
guess with 
> the two pinkish white seashells covering her chest, her entire 
armor being a 
> sort of off pink.
> She yawned slightly and looked over her shoulder at the two other 
> transformers, pushing a set of actual glasses up the bridge of her 
nose.*
> 
> 
>
